tool_description: Creates detailed customer spending profiles and segments based on transaction history, identifying high-value customers and spending patterns.

transaction_data_id.description: Reference ID of previously extracted transaction data

segmentation_method.description: Customer segmentation approach: rfm, spend_based, frequency_based, hybrid

segment_count.description: Number of customer segments to create

minimum_transactions.description: Minimum number of transactions required to include a customer

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to look back for recency analysis

include_cohort_analysis.description: Whether to include customer cohort analysis

high_value_threshold.description: Monetary threshold for identifying high-value customers

error_messages: Invalid transaction data ID: Provided ID does not reference valid transaction data.
Invalid segmentation method: Use one of [rfm, spend_based, frequency_based, hybrid].
Invalid segment count: Must be an integer between 2 and 20.
Invalid minimum transactions: Must be a positive integer.
Invalid analysis period: Must be between 30 and 1095 days.
Invalid high value threshold: Must be a positive number.
Insufficient customer data: Need transactions from at least 10 unique customers for meaningful profiling.
usage: Provide transaction_data_id with customer information, configure segmentation parameters and analysis options to generate comprehensive customer spending profiles.

customer_segments.description: Customer segments with characteristics and size

high_value_customers.description: Number of customers exceeding high-value threshold

spending_patterns.description: Identified customer spending patterns and behaviors

retention_insights.description: Analysis of customer retention and churn patterns

segment_revenue_distribution.description: Revenue contribution percentage by customer segment
